pull.title: qt: drop unused watch-only functionality
pull.body:
The watch-only functionality in the GUI was only used for legacy wallets. Watch-only descriptor wallets do not use this.

The only visible changes of this commit should be dropping the "Spendable:" label from the overview tab.

Builds on #32438.

remove dead flush()

It is confusing that the chain client flush happens between
StopHTTPServer and StopMapPort. Also, it is unused code. Seems best to
just add it back properly when it is needed again.

events.message:

It is confusing that the chain client flush happens between
StopHTTPServer and StopMapPort. Also, it is unused code. Seems best to

The only visible changes of this commit is dropping the "Spendable:" label from the overview tab.

events.message:
qt: drop unused watch-only functionality

The watch-only functionality in the GUI was only used for legacy wallets. Watch-only descriptor wallets do not use this.

The only visible changes of this commit is dropping the "Spendable:" label from the overview tab.

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--006a51241073e994b41acfe9ec718e94-->
### Code Coverage & Benchmarks
For details see: https://corecheck.dev/bitcoin/bitcoin/pulls/32459.
<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
A summary of reviews will appear here.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#bitcoin-core/gui/775](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/775) (Add used balance to overview page by BrandonOdiwuor)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
<!--5faf32d7da4f0f540f40219e4f7537a3-->
### LLM Linter (✨ experimental)

Possible typos and grammar issues:

- `Is"); /* Unsolvable or spending from watch-only */` -> (remove line or fix syntax) [Invalid C++ syntax/malformed comment impacting comprehension.]
- `virtual isminetype Is:" ; // I think this is a typo. "Is:" followed by a comment doesn't look right. Seems incomplete or malformed.` -> `virtual isminetype IsMine(const CScript& script) const = 0;` [Invalid C++ syntax (`Is:" ;`) where a function declaration is expected, impacting comprehension.]

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -317,12 +317,9 @@ QT_TRANSLATE_NOOP("bitcoin-core", "Error reading configuration file: %s"),
 QT_TRANSLATE_NOOP("bitcoin-core", "Error reading from database, shutting down."),
 QT_TRANSLATE_NOOP("bitcoin-core", "Error reading next record from wallet database"),
 QT_TRANSLATE_NOOP("bitcoin-core", "Error: Cannot extract destination from the generated scriptpubkey"),
-QT_TRANSLATE_NOOP("bitcoin-core", "Error: Could not add watchonly tx %s to watchonly wallet"),
comments.body: this should probably be a separate commit, just updating the whole file, or nothing in the file?

comments.body:
I think we shouldn't touch this file in this PR:

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/b070ce16966fe18eb68f886ab9ca02d1d05a2f2a/src/qt/bitcoinstrings.cpp#L5
